channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🔴 00:10 Air alert in Zhytomyr region. Follow further messages.
item.description: 🔴 00:10 Air alert in Zhytomyr region. Follow further messages. #Zhytomyr_region This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🟡 11:46 p.m. The alarm was sounded in the Dnipropetrovsk region. Please note that the alarm is still ongoing in:- m. Marganets and Marganets territorial community - m. Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community - Pokrovsk Territorial Community - Chervonogrigorivska Territorial Community
item.description: 🟡 11:46 p.m. The alarm was sounded in the Dnipropetrovsk region. Please note that the alarm is still ongoing in:- m. Marganets and Marganets territorial community - m. Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community - Pokrovsk Territorial Community - Chervonogrigorivska Territorial Community#Dnipropetrovsk_Oblast This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
